hypothesis_h1.test: Boundary-aware optimizes local geometry, sacrifices global
hypothesis_h1.expected: Lower local_distortion, higher global_distortion for boundary-aware
hypothesis_h1.observation: Boundary-aware shows LOWER local distortion but also LOWER global distortion
hypothesis_h1.verdict: FALSIFIED: H1 does not hold. Boundary-aware improves both local AND global geometry.
